languages.text: "И это говорите мне вы, {name}?" {n}Джай иронично изгибает бровь.{/n} "Я устала строчить бесконечные контракты и соглашения, отсиживаясь на Футфоле. Занимаюсь этим последние... сколько лет? А там, меж звезд, ты всегда на острие ножа. Ничто так не щекочет нервы, как напряжение от полетов сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} или ожидание опасности за каждым углом на планете. На Футфоле я начала костенеть и глупеть, шерин. Я этого не хочу".

traits.locale_text: "И это говорите мне вы, {name}?" {n}Джай иронично изгибает бровь.{/n} "Я устала строчить бесконечные контракты и соглашения, отсиживаясь на Футфоле. Занимаюсь этим последние... сколько лет? А там, меж звезд, ты всегда на острие ножа. Ничто так не щекочет нервы, как напряжение от полетов сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} или ожидание опасности за каждым углом на планете. На Футфоле я начала костенеть и глупеть, шерин. Я этого не хочу".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "You're one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."
languages.original_text: "И это говорите мне вы, {name}?" {n}Джай иронично изгибает бровь.{/n} "Я устала строчить бесконечные контракты и соглашения, отсиживаясь на Футфоле. Занимаюсь этим последние... сколько лет? А там, меж звезд, ты всегда на острие ножа. Ничто так не щекочет нервы, как напряжение от полетов сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} или ожидание опасности за каждым углом на планете. На Футфоле я начала костенеть и глупеть, шерин. Я этого не хочу".

traits.locale_text: "You are the one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow ironically.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away at Footfall. I have been doing it for... how many years? But you are always balancing on the edge here, among the stars. Nothing thrills me more that the tension during Warp jumps of the danger lurking behind every corner on a planet. I felt Footfall was making me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are the one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow ironically.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away at Footfall. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你又何尝不是呢，{name}？”{n}婕伊扬起了眉毛。{/n}“我已经厌倦了落脚港没完没了的合同与协议。这种事情我已经干了……多少年？但在这里，在群星之间，无论做什么都像是在刀尖上跳舞。没有什么事情比{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}跳跃更刺激，更能令我兴奋，更不用提那些危机四伏的行星了。落脚港让我变得越来越脑满肠肥，亲爱的，我可不想变成那个样子。”
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."

traits.locale_text: “你又何尝不是呢，{name}？”{n}婕伊扬起了眉毛。{/n}“我已经厌倦了落脚港没完没了的合同与协议。这种事情我已经干了……多少年？但在这里，在群星之间，无论做什么都像是在刀尖上跳舞。没有什么事情比{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}跳跃更刺激，更能令我兴奋，更不用提那些危机四伏的行星了。落脚港让我变得越来越脑满肠肥，亲爱的，我可不想变成那个样子。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, ." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a warp jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."

languages.text: «¿Y me lo dice usted, {name}?». {n}Jae alza una ceja.{/n} «Me harté de redactar una infinidad de contratos y acuerdos sentadita en Paso. Esa fue mi vida durante... ¿cuántos años? Pero aquí, entre las estrellas, todos estamos en el filo de la navaja. Nada me emociona más que la tensión de un salto de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, o el peligro que acecha tras cada esquina de un planeta. Paso empezaba a volverme gorda y estúpida, shereen. Eso no es lo que quiero».
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y me lo dice usted, {name}?». {n}Jae alza una ceja.{/n} «Me harté de redactar una infinidad de contratos y acuerdos sentadita en Paso. Esa fue mi vida durante... ¿cuántos años? Pero aquí, entre las estrellas, todos estamos en el filo de la navaja. Nada me emociona más que la tensión de un salto de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}, o el peligro que acecha tras cada esquina de un planeta. Paso empezaba a volverme gorda y estúpida, shereen. Eso no es lo que quiero».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたはおしゃべりだね、{name}」{n}ジェイは眉をひそめる。{/n}「フットフォールに整然と収められた、終わりのない契約書や合意書を書き写すのに嫌気がさしたんだ。あたしは…何年やってたんだっけ？でもここでは、星々の間で、あんたは常に崖っぷちでギリギリの行動を取り続けている。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}ジャンプの緊張感や、惑星のいたるところに潜む危険ほどスリリングなものはない。足取りが重くなると、太ってバカになる。そんなことは望んでいないのさ」
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたはおしゃべりだね、{name}」{n}ジェイは眉をひそめる。{/n}「フットフォールに整然と収められた、終わりのない契約書や合意書を書き写すのに嫌気がさしたんだ。あたしは…何年やってたんだっけ？でもここでは、星々の間で、あんたは常に崖っぷちでギリギリの行動を取り続けている。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}ジャンプの緊張感や、惑星のいたるところに潜む危険ほどスリリングなものはない。足取りが重くなると、太ってバカになる。そんなことは望んでいないのさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr müsst gerade reden, {name}." {n}Jae hebt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ich war es leid, auf Footfall zu sitzen und endlose Verträge und Vereinbarungen aufzuschreiben. Das habe ich ... wie viele Jahre lang getan? Doch hier, zwischen den Sternen, balanciert man ständig auf einer Messerklinge. Nichts berauscht mich mehr als die Anspannung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warpsprungs{/g} oder die Gefahr, die auf einem Planeten hinter jeder Ecke lauert. Footfall ließ mich langsam fett und dumm werden, Shereen. Das möchte ich nicht."
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst gerade reden, {name}." {n}Jae hebt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ich war es leid, auf Footfall zu sitzen und endlose Verträge und Vereinbarungen aufzuschreiben. Das habe ich ... wie viele Jahre lang getan? Doch hier, zwischen den Sternen, balanciert man ständig auf einer Messerklinge. Nichts berauscht mich mehr als die Anspannung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warpsprungs{/g} oder die Gefahr, die auf einem Planeten hinter jeder Ecke lauert. Footfall ließ mich langsam fett und dumm werden, Shereen. Das möchte ich nicht."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes mal {mf|placé|placée} pour me poser cette question, {name}, {n}déclare Jae en haussant un sourcil.{/n} J'en ai eu marre de passer mon temps à rédiger des contrats et des accords dans mon petit coin tranquille de Castel. J'ai fait ça pendant tant d'années que j'en ai perdu le compte. Mais ici, parmi les étoiles, on vit sur le fil du rasoir. Rien ne me fait autant vibrer que la tension d'un saut {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ou les dangers tapis aux quatre coins d'une planète. Castel commençait à me rendre complaisante et stupide, shereen. Je ne veux pas finir comme ça. »
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes mal {mf|placé|placée} pour me poser cette question, {name}, {n}déclare Jae en haussant un sourcil.{/n} J'en ai eu marre de passer mon temps à rédiger des contrats et des accords dans mon petit coin tranquille de Castel. J'ai fait ça pendant tant d'années que j'en ai perdu le compte. Mais ici, parmi les étoiles, on vit sur le fil du rasoir. Rien ne me fait autant vibrer que la tension d'un saut {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ou les dangers tapis aux quatre coins d'une planète. Castel commençait à me rendre complaisante et stupide, shereen. Je ne veux pas finir comme ça. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bunu sen mi söylüyorsun {name}?" {n}Jae tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Binliman'a yığılmış kontrat ve anlaşmaları kaleme almak, bir yerden sonra sıktı. Aynı işi kaç sene yaptım. Burada ise yıldızların arasındasın, sürekli bıçak sırtındasın. Bana {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öte{/g} sıçrama veya her köşesinden farklı bir tehlike fırlayan bir gezegen kadar heyecan veren başka bir şey yok. Binliman'da şişmanlıyor, aptallaşıyordum şirinim. Böyle bir şey olsun istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "You're one to talk, {name}." {n}Jae raises an eyebrow.{/n} "I grew tired of scribing endless contracts and agreements, neatly tucked away on Footfall. I did that for... how many years? But here, among the stars, you are always balanced on a knife-edge. Nothing thrills me more than the tension of a {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} jump, or the danger that lurks around every corner on a planet. Footfall was beginning to make me fat and stupid, shereen. I do not want that."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu sen mi söylüyorsun {name}?" {n}Jae tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Binliman'a yığılmış kontrat ve anlaşmaları kaleme almak bir yerden sonra sıkıcı hâle geldi. Kaç yıl yaptım o işi? Burada ise yıldızların arasındasın, sürekli bıçak sırtındasın. Bana {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} sıçraması veya her köşesinden farklı bir tehlike fırlayan bir gezegen kadar heyecan veren başka bir şey yok. Binliman beni şişman ve aptal yapmaya başlamıştı şirinim. Böyle bir şey olsun istemiyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
